name: Nabiev Muhammadjon Borievich
text: was born in 1958. In 1984, M.B.Nabiev graduated from the Bukhara Institute of Food and Light Industry Technology,majoring in agricultural machinery. From 1984, he was the chief laboratory assistant, assistant of the 'Theory of Machines and Mechanisms' department of Bukh OO and ESTI, then assistant of the 'Mechanics' department, 1st category in 1996-2000,leading specialist in natural science of Bukhara region.
